mapper.select: SELECT eudi.receiveOpenId as openId,eu.nickname,eu.headimgurl,eudi.created as shardDateTime FROM t_eds_user_dist eud left join t_eds_user_dist_item eudi on eud.id = eudi.distId left join t_eds_user eu on eudi.receiveOpenId = eu.openId WHERE eud.sponsorOpenId = #{openId} and eud.distStatus = 'S_DIST_JXZ' AND eud.dataStatus = 1 and eudi.dataStatus = 1 and eudi.isActived = 1 ORDER BY eudi.created DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
